description.narrative: Improved framework conditions for inclusive and resilient privates sector led growth, especially in critical value chains and strengthened economic management

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Attracting and enabling Private Investment and Improving Somalia Trade Facilitation

1. Doing Business at Federal government of Somalia- Support to data collection and development of reform memo 2. Sub-national Doing Business-Support to data collection and development of reform 3. Support development of action plan for Doing Business

target.value: Facilitate enactment of the Companies Act 2019, support advisory reports reviewing key sectoral legislations, support drafting of Doing Business Action Plan

actual.value: At Federal Government of Somalia, facilitated enactment of the Companies Act 2019, supported advisory reports reviewing key sectoral laws and support drafting of Doing Business Action Plan. At federal level, facilitated two Doing Business reform training events, one workshop in Hargeisa on business online registration. Recommendation on need to establish Trade information portal.

target.value: Conduct Business registration baseline survey at federal level and support Doing Business reform update memo

actual.value: Completed Business registration baseline survey at federal level and supported Doing Business reform update memo to the World Bank's Doing Business Team. In March, supported establishment of National Trade Facilitation Committee

target.value: Support to drafting of implementation regulations under the Companies Act, drafting of the Business Licensing Bill. Submit final version of of company regulations, the business licensing bill and national building and standards policy for Government' endorsement . In Somaliland, complete a vendor for business registration one stop shop and initiate the development of the system.
Continue with the capacity building support to Ministry of Commerce and chamber of Commer
In total 5 related laws enacted/ammendments/ regulations developed as well as procedures

title.narrative: Market scoping and deep dives of opportunities for innovative financial products and services
1.Number of market insights reports 2.Number of missions conducted 3.Number of Private Sector Development (PSD) donor meetings

target.value: Finalise sector deep dives in Somaliland and Somalia to identify market opportunities for innovative financial products and services.

actual.value: Market scoping still ongoing, drafting of diagnostic reports ongoing

target.value: Convene stakeholders meeting of all known microfinance players in Somaliland, In Federal level-launch of diagnostics meeting with central banks and relevant financial institions in Hargeisa and Mogadishu on credit reporting and moveable collateral registries

actual.value: Meeting of microfinance stakeholders held in Hargeisa in September 2019, IFC launched two diagnostics meetings with central banks and financial institutions in Mogadishu and Hargeisa. Participated in 3 Somalia private sector development donor meetings

target.value: Finalise sector deep dives and deliver at least 4 sector level activities and complete market infrastructure diagnotic reports, and complete market deep dives
Implementation phase of 4 sector level activities
Produce needs analysis reports with proposed solutions for credit referencing and collateral registries, training needs assessment report for banks and other financial institutions.

title.narrative: Improved Investment Climate leads to unlocking of Private Investment and Trade.

1. Number of Company Laws enacted, regulations developed as well as procedures improved including operationalisation of One Stop Shop. 2. Number of new investment frameworks drafted for key sectors 3. Existence of programme to increase access to regional markets.

target.value: In total 5 related laws enacted /ammendment/regulations developed and operationalised

title.narrative: Increased access to finance, improved financial inclusion and new products for financial institutions
1. Number of new financial products launched 2. Number of SMEs that can access formal leasing financing for which they would not normally qualify/other financial products.

target.value: Market scoping reports of market opportunity for MSME financing, agric-finance, leasing and digital financial services, produce training needs assessment report for banks and other financial institutions, financial institutional appraisals and complete assessment reports with recommendations for improvement
